name: Better to use QUALIFIED data structures  (RPG400)
description: This rule searches for all RPG400 programs not using QUALIFIED data structures.
output:
This report lists RPG400 programs not using QUALIFIED data structures.
It provides the following information:
RPG400 Program full name
rationale: Qualified data structures allow you to use the same field name in multiple structures without name conflict, provide a means of defining standard structures (the most obvious use of this is for APIs), and they lead to self documenting code.
remediation: Try to use the QUALIFIED data structures in the RPG400 programs.
alternativeName: Better to use QUALIFIED data structures  (RPG400)
